title: One Piece Double Recap: Episodes 382 & 383
author: The Adult Swim Squad
description: Detailed double recap covering episodes 382 and 383 of the Spa Island Arc, including analysis of Foxy's return, the sisters' story, and Doran's villainy. The review provides scene-by-scene commentary and rates the episodes.

title: One Piece | Spa Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap, & Review
author: Poggers Staff
description: Comprehensive review of the entire Spa Island Arc describing it as 'a classic example of a forgettable filler arc' that adds virtually no substance to One Piece's events. Provides arc summary and critical analysis.

title: One Piece Filler Episodes and Arcs You Can Skip
author: CBR Staff
description: Comprehensive guide to One Piece filler content including the Spa Island Arc. The article discusses how the Spa Island and Foxy's Return arcs bring back the divisive Foxy character, making him less popular with fans.
